title: 4 Stocks Nearing Key Breakouts
text:
4 Stocks Nearing Key Breakouts

Harry BoxerStock Markets 3 hours ago (Oct 16, 2019 01:16PM ET) By

www.investing.com/analysis/4-stocks-nearing-key-breakouts-200474166 4 Stocks Nearing Key Breakouts By By Harry Boxer | 3 hours ago (Oct 16, 2019 01:16PM ET)

Follow 4 Stocks Positioned Right At Key Technical Breakout Point. Horizon Therapeutics Public Limited Company (NASDAQ: ) climbed 92 cents to $28.20 on 2.3 million shares Tuesday, more than 1 1/2 times its average volume. The move, which came on no news from the drug maker targeting treatments for rare and rheumatic diseases, edged the stock out of a 2-month sideways channel. A break above the May high near $29.25 could get the stock to $32 next. Seattle Genetics (NASDAQ: ) rose 96 cents to $83.38 on 890,200 shares Tuesday. The move, on no news from the developer of cancer therapies, positioned the stock right at the declining tops line of its 2-week wedge pattern. A follow-through breaking out of the wedge could take the stock to $89. Winnebago Industries (NYSE: ) jumped $2.04 to $40.49 on 637,300 shares Tuesday. The move, which comes ahead of next week's earnings release, popped the stock out of a 3-week wedge formation, positioning it right against lateral resistance near $41. A break through there could take the stock to the $47 level reached in June of last year. XPO Logistics (NYSE: ) gained $1.19 to $75.85 on 905,000 shares Tuesday. The provider of transportation and logistics solutions announced it's expanding its fleet of alternative fuel vehicles. The stock is now at lateral resistance after running up for five days in a row. Target (NYSE: ) is the rising channel top near $85. See Harry's video chart analysis on these stocks. No holdings

4 Stocks Nearing Key Breakouts
description: Stocks Analysis by Harry Boxer covering: Target Corporation, Seattle Genetics Inc, Horizon Pharma PLC, Winnebago Industries Inc. Read Harry Boxer's latest article on Investing.com
